price: 15. (Alle) waa Kan iska leh Darajada ugu Sarreysa ee Kaamilka ah, waa Rabbiga Carshiga (Weyn). Wuxuu ku soo dejiyaa waxyiga Amarkiisa ah qofkuu doono oo ka mid ah Addoomahiisa si uu ugaga digo (dadka) Maalinta kulanka (Qiyaamada).
arabic: رَفِيعُ ٱلدَّرَجَٰتِ ذُو ٱلۡعَرۡشِ يُلۡقِي ٱلرُّوحَ مِنۡ أَمۡرِهِۦ عَلَىٰ مَن يَشَآءُ مِنۡ عِبَادِهِۦ لِيُنذِرَ يَوۡمَ ٱلتَّلَاقِ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: rafīʿu al-darajāti dhū al-ʿarshi yul'qī al-rūḥa min amrihi ʿalā man yashāu min ʿibādihi liyundhira yawma al-talāqi
